reviewText: A classic!  The actual sound track would be great, but the remake by the cast mixed it up differently.

A very funny film about Israel. You follow a chorus of the Israeli army in the year 1968. Among the songs of the film "Shiru shir lashalom" (Sing a song for peace) that was actually created in that very same chorus  and became later the anthem of pacifist movements in Israel!

I lived in Israel throught the 60's and 70's, so for me this was a delightful movie, filled with nostalgia about the country and the time. The music is excellent, the acting good, the characters very appealing. I don't know how people without this experience would view it, but for everyone in my family, it was a must-see.
